channel.title: Castle PKing Thought?
channel.description:
Since most of the "PK-ing" is done in Dragon Maze/ Mage Arena. I Think it would be a nice change for MOST of the PK-ing to be done at the castle? Im not saying like.. lvl 100s+ at castle. i mean like.. LVL:"20-70" And making rune actually something worth getting. Because if you PK a r2h/Dlong/ETC and you know its not that hard to get. it's not as rewarding. If you know it's hard to obtain the item, then it'll give you a stronger feeling on what PK-ing is mostly about.
What do you think? ;)

item.title: Castle PKing Thought?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Pking is shitty now. Back in RSCD it was actually a fun feeling to walk up to edgeville wilderness and see like 100 level 6-30 noobs in iron all with their archer teams waiting for some nub to step in wildy so they can team him. The the 25-50s who used to hang around edgevill to castle, was fun times back then… cause you actually tried not to die.

All servers these days, if i died with all the best shit id laugh, or same umm k.

StorkPK was also good, dueling as mages and sending packets to autocast and win fights. Got my fair share of dmeds there.

Read full topic

item.title: Castle PKing Thought?
item.dc:creator: @Stork Stork
item.description:
@Stork wrote:

Yeah, the trick is to get the right balance between items being hard to get & easy to get.

Too hard and people will quit until they ever come about,
too easy and it’s just not worth playing for.

Read full topic
